SAINT.Name: Saints Athanasius the Great (+373) and Cyril (+444), Archbishops of Alexandria
Venerable Marcian of Cyrrhus in Syria (+c.388)
Holy Hierarch Maximus, Archbishop of Serbia
Monk Athanasius of Syademsk and Vologda (+c.1550)
Venerable Schema-monk Cyrill and Schema-nun Mary, parents of St Sergius of Radonezh (+ c 1337)
